description:
Redistribution in Aegean Palatial Societies.
Edited by Michael L. Galaty, Dimitri Nakassis, and William A. Parkinson.
Introduction: Why Redistribution?. Michael L. Galaty, Dimitri Nakassis, and William A. Parkinson
Redistributive Economies from a Theoretical and Cross-Cultural Perspective. Dimitri Nakassis, William A. Parkinson, and Michael L. Galaty
Before the Palaces: Redistribution and Chiefdoms in Mainland Greece. Daniel J. Pullen
Redistribution and Political Economies in Bronze Age Crete. Kostis S. Christakis
A View from Outside the Palace: The Sanctuary and the Damos in Mycenaean Economy and Society. Susan Lupack
By Appointment to His Majesty the Wanax: Value-Added Goods and Redistribution in Mycenaean Palatial Economies. Robert Schon
Terminology, Scale, and Significance. Paul Halstead
Redistribution and the Political Economy: The Evolution of an Idea. Timothy Earle
Edited by Michael L. Galaty, Dimitri Nakassis, and William A. Parkinson. Introduction: Why Redistribution?. Michael L. Galaty, Dimitri Nakassis, and William A. Parkinson Redistributive Economies from a Theoretical and Cross-Cultural Perspective. Dimitri Nakassis, William A. Parkinson, and Michael L. Galaty Before the Palaces: Redistribution and Chiefdoms in Mainland Greece. Daniel J. Pullen Redistribution and Political Economies in Bronze Age Crete. Kostis S. Christakis A View from Outside the Palace: The Sanctuary and the Damos in Mycenaean Economy and Society. Susan Lupack By Appointment to His Majesty the Wanax: Value-Added Goods and Redistribution in Mycenaean Palatial Economies. Robert Schon Terminology, Scale, and Significance. Paul Halstead Redistribution and the Political Economy: The Evolution of an Idea. Timothy Earle.
title: Redistribution in Aegean Palatial Societies
